author: donaldp
msg: Added target that wrote to file. However this target will open and close stream for *each* log event.

author: donaldp
msg: Fixed heinous bug that ignored directory of input File parameter.
Allow input parameter in constructor to be null.
Allow subclasses access to file object via getFile().

author: donaldp
msg: Also made setOutputStream() not automagically call open/close.

author: donaldp
msg: Renamed m_closed to m_isOpen and added access for subclasses via protected method isOpen().
In open/close checked that you are open before closing and vice versa.

author: donaldp
msg: Made sure unit tests work and added warning about test server.
